mapper.sql: id, trans_time, agent_no, agent_node, bp_id, service_id, trans_amount, single_count, calc_time, agent_share_amount
mapper.update:
update agent_trans_collect
trans_time = #{transTime,jdbcType=DATE},
agent_no = #{agentNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
agent_node = #{agentNode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
bp_id = #{bpId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
service_id = #{serviceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
trans_amount = #{transAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
single_count = #{singleCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
agent_share_amount = #{agentShareAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
calc_time = #{calcTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update agent_trans_collect set trans_time = #{transTime,jdbcType=DATE}, agent_no = #{agentNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, agent_node = #{agentNode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bp_id = #{bpId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, service_id = #{serviceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, trans_amount = #{transAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, single_count = #{singleCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, agent_share_amount = #{agentShareAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, calc_time = #{calcTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
